title: Not your key not your BTC
author: Not your key not your BTC
content: I just watch in youtube if many zombie in kensington Philadelphia, why police didn't catch them?,

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Not your key not your BTC on June 17, 2023, 08:45:11 AMI just watch in youtube if many zombie in kensington Philadelphia, why police didn't catch them?, The video you have seen on Youtube is totally fake and is work of fiction created by Youtubers to entertain the public. Those videos demonstrate the ability of the creators who have created such piece of art. Their intention to create those videos is to entertain the public and earn revenue form Youtube AdSense program. The police official might know about the videos and that's why they are not taking any actions against such things because in reality none of those exist.Don't just blindly trust such videos and do deep research before getting to any conclusion. The creators mostly love the idea of creating something that has the element of horror in it so that the audience would love to watch it and share it with their friends and loved ones. If we blindly trust those videos then we may develop fear in our hearts and which isn't a good thing my friend.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: those videos are of homeless and people on drugs..(occasional prostitute)being homeless or on drugs is not a crime.the cops only go after dealers and pimps (and squatters rarely, as that involves the court system)

comments.author: larry_vw_1955
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on July 02, 2023, 04:26:43 PMthose videos are of homeless and people on drugs..(occasional prostitute)being homeless or on drugs is not a crime.that might have been true 10 years ago but i guess you don't really keep up with the news. i don't either but at least i heard about this: https://www.vice.com/en/article/mb8we3/cities-keep-making-being-homeless-a-crime-is-that-legalQuotethe cops only go after dealers and pimps (and squatters rarely, as that involves the court system)that's how you imagine it to be but read the story I linked above.Laceyâ€™s City Council joined them on June 13, unanimously passing a law allowing cops to fine people up to $1,000 or sentence them to jail for 90 days for camping in public places if thereâ€™s a shelter bed available locally.so lets say they get fined $1000 instead of 90 days in jail. when they don't pay that money they REALLY become a criminal because then an arrest warrant might be issued for them. So then the cops will out scouting the streets for some homeless person to lock up. either way they're going to end up in jail.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: Quote from: Not your key not your BTC on June 17, 2023, 08:45:11 AMI just watch in youtube if many zombie in kensington Philadelphia, why police didn't catch them?, Maybe the police are too busy catching the real zombies in Washington DC ðŸ˜‚

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Do you really believe there are zombies in the twentieth century? This is nonsense.Without watching the video, I am sure that it is a montage by some YouTubers to earn more money.
